read something ↔ out.translation[0].defi: to read and say words that are written down, so that people can hear
Why don’t you read out the name of the winner?
He read the last few sentences out to me.
read something ↔ out.translation[1].defi: information that is produced by a computer and shown on a screen
a read-out of all the sales figures
read something ↔ out.translation[2].defi: the information that is shown on a computer screen
a read-out of all the sales figures
